content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

-- Querying taxi_zone File
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone(
    location_id SMALLINT,
    borough VARCHAR(15),
    zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejected_rows_location/taxi_zone'
);

SELECT * FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

--Querying Calendar File
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.calender') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE nyc_taxi_ldw.bronze.calender;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calender(
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(15),
    day_of_year INT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year INT,
    month_name VARCHAR(15),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'raw/calender.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejected_rows_location/calender'
);

SELECT * FROM bronze.calender;
